original_text: And between the throne and the four living creatures and among the elders I saw a Lamb standing, as though it had been slain, with seven horns and with seven eyes, which are the seven spirits of God sent out into all the earth.
korean_text: 내가 또 보니 보좌와 네 생물과 장로들 사이에 한 어린 양이 서 있는데 일찍이 죽임을 당한 것 같더라 그에게 일곱 뿔과 일곱 눈이 있으니 이 눈들은 온 땅에 보내심을 받은 하나님의 일곱 영이더라

sentences.original_text: And between the throne and the four living creatures

sentences.korean_translation: 나는 서 있는 어린 양을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: as though it had been slain
which are the seven spirits of God
sent out into all the earth
